flawed_nl_solution:
June had 76 stickers and was given 25 from her grandparents so she had 76 + 25 = <<76+25=104>>104 stickers
Bonnie had 63 stickers and was given 25 from her grandparents so she had 63 + 25 = <<63+25=88>>88 stickers
June had 104 stickers and Bonnie had 88 stickers so together, they had 104 + 88 = <<104+88=192>>192 stickers
#### 192

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 101, not 104. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
